statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT card_number, cardholder_name FROM credit_card_information WHERE card_number LIKE '1234%';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_information WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cardholder_name, cvv FROM credit_card_information WHERE id IN (2,3);
SELECT id, cardholder_name, cvv FROM credit_card_information WHERE cardholder_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, card_number FROM credit_card_information WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_information WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT id, cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_card_information ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, cardholder_name, cvv FROM credit_card_information WHERE cardholder_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cards, cardholder_name FROM credit_card_information GROUP BY cardholder_name HAVING total_cards > 1;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT id, card_holder_name, card_expiration_date FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_cvv, card_number FROM credit_cards ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT card_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT card_number, card_expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE card_id = 1;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_cvv FROM credit_cards WHERE card_expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_cvv, card_holder_name FROM credit_cards INNER JOIN transactions ON credit_cards.id = transactions.card_id WHERE transaction_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM credit_card;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer.first_name, transaction.amount, transaction.transaction_date FROM customer JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id;

SELECT customer.first_name, credit_card.card_number, transaction.amount FROM customer JOIN credit_card ON customer.credit_card_id = credit_card.id JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id ORDER BY transaction.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, credit_card.card_number FROM customer INNER JOIN credit_card ON customer.credit_card_id = credit_card.id;
SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, transaction.amount FROM customer LEFT JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id;
SELECT customer.first_name, transaction.amount FROM transaction JOIN customer ON transaction.customer_id = customer.customer_id WHERE transaction.amount > 1000;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, credit_card.card_number, transaction.amount FROM customer JOIN credit_card ON customer.credit_card_id = credit_card.id JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.customer_id WHERE transaction.amount > 500 AND credit_card.card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM CreditCardData;
SELECT cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM CreditCardData WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 10;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date, payment_status FROM Payments WHERE payment_status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM CreditCardData WHERE cardholder_name='John Doe';
SELECT card_number, expiration_date, cvv FROM CreditCardData WHERE expiration_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount>1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_status='Pending' AND payment_amount<500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE credit_card_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number, expiration_date FROM customers WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE credit_card_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date
